item.title: 澳大利亚顶级葡萄酒酿造商报告廉价瓶装葡萄酒需求疲软
item.description: 澳大利亚 Treasury Wine Estates Ltd.的股价下跌了 10%，因为该公司表示，在截至 12 月份的六个月里，其低成本葡萄酒的利润率下降了近 50%。【原文：Shares of Australia’s Treasury Wine Estates Ltd. fell as much as 10% after the company flagged that profitability of its low-cost wines dropped almost 50% in the six months through December.】

item.title: 取消外资持股限制后 Jollibee 股价大涨
item.description: 周四，Jollibee Foods Corp.的股价攀升了5%以上，因为这家菲律宾最大的餐饮运营商表示，它已获得菲律宾证券交易所的批准，取消了外资持有该公司40%股份的上限。【原文：Shares of Jollibee Foods Corp. climbed more than 5% on Thursday after the Philippines’ top restaurant operator said it has secured the bourse’s approval to remove a 40% cap on foreign ownership of the company.】

item.title: 印度央行专注于宽松货币政策，卢比有望遭受更多损失
item.description: 印度卢比近两年来的最大单日涨幅令交易商措手不及，但由于货币宽松和全球波动加剧，涨势可能是短暂的。【原文：The Indian rupee’s biggest one-day jump in almost two years caught traders off guard, but the gains may be short-lived due to monetary easing and rising global volatility.】

item.title: 中国科技股向重启涨势以来的最高水平迈进
item.description: 交易员们争相购买具有人工智能潜力的中国科技股，使恒生科技股指数（Hang Seng Tech Index）有望创下中国科维时代（Covid）改革开放以来的最高水平。【原文：Traders’ rush to buy Chinese technology stocks for their artificial intelligence potential has put the Hang Seng Tech Index on course for its highest level since the nation’s Covid-era reopening rally.】

item.title: 印尼寻求新协议，"令人震惊 "的特朗普关税引发贸易动荡
item.description: 印尼贸易部副部长Dyah Roro Esti Widya Putri表示，随着全球保护主义的加剧，印尼正在寻求市场多元化，同时也在采取措施保护本地制造商。【原文：Indonesia is seeking to diversify its markets as global protectionism intensifies, while also taking steps to defend its local manufacturers, Deputy Trade Minister Dyah Roro Esti Widya Putri said.】

item.title: 报告称中国土地出让显示房地产市场趋于稳定
item.description: 据《经济参考报》报道，最近几周，中国房地产市场出现企稳迹象，重点城市的地块以高溢价成交。【原文：China’s property market is showing signs of stabilizing, with land plots in key cities sold at high premiums in recent weeks, according to a report in the Economic Information Daily.】

item.title: 风险上升，韩国科技出口失去增长动力
item.description: 在中国农历新年假期需求萎缩之后，韩国的技术出口一年多来首次出现萎缩，而保护主义和 DeepSeek 对半导体销售的潜在影响仍令人担忧。【原文：South Korea recorded a contraction in technology exports for the first time in more than a year after demand from China cratered during the lunar new year holiday, while concerns persist about the potential impact of protectionism and DeepSeek on semiconductor sales.】

item.title: 盖尔说：特朗普促进液化天然气发展的计划将有助于印度买家
item.description: 印度最大的液化天然气买家之一盖尔印度有限公司（Gail India Ltd.）预计，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普提高能源产量的目标将使这个对价格敏感的国家进口燃料变得更加可行。【原文：Gail India Ltd., one of the country’s top liquefied natural gas buyers, expects US President Donald Trump’s goal of increasing energy production to make fuel imports more viable in the price-sensitive nation.】

item.title: 趋势科技因收购战报道股价大涨 16
item.description: 据报道，多家私募股权公司正争相收购这家价值 85 亿美元的日本网络安全公司，趋势科技公司股价创下 2023 年 11 月以来最大涨幅。【原文：Trend Micro Inc. shares jumped the most since November 2023 on reports that several private equity firms are vying to take over the $8.5 billion Japanese cybersecurity firm.】

item.title: 中国债券反弹遇阻，大众交易蒙受损失
item.description: 随着长期主权债券的收益率与投资者最喜爱的融资工具的成本之间出现十多年来最大幅度的折让，中国的债券狂潮可能即将消退。【原文：China’s bond frenzy may be close to fizzling out as yields on long-term sovereign notes trade at the deepest discount in more than a decade to the cost of investors’ favorite financing tool.】

item.title: 日本生产者价格加速上涨，使日本央行继续加息
item.description: 上个月，日本企业商品价格上涨速度加快，创下了 19 个月以来的最快速度，使日本央行继续保持进一步加息的势头。【原文：The pace of gains in Japan’s corporate goods prices accelerated last month to the fastest clip in 19 months, keeping the Bank of Japan on track for further interest rate hikes.】

item.title: ByteDance 早期支持者将融资目标减半，初创公司押注冷静
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，由于投资者的兴趣低于预期，TikTok 所有者字节跳动有限公司最早的支持者之一源码资本（Source Code Capital）将其筹资目标减半至约 1.5 亿美元。【原文：Source Code Capital, among the earliest backers of TikTok owner ByteDance Ltd., is halving its fundraising target to about $150 million due to less-than-expected investor interest, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利将无折扣出售 30 亿美元 X 债务
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）正在敲定出售 X 控股公司（X Holdings Corp. ）另外 30 亿美元的债务，从而在长达数年之久的努力中取得了进一步的进展，这些贷款支持了埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对社交媒体平台的动荡收购。【原文：Morgan Stanley is finalizing the sale of another $3 billion of X Holdings Corp. debt, making further progress in a years-long effort to offload loans that supported Elon Musk’s tumultuous purchase of the social-media platform.】

item.title: 交易员权衡贸易担忧和美联储宽松政策，黄金维持在 2,900 美元附近
item.description: 黄金在历史高位附近企稳，原因是交易员们在美国最新的通胀数据与唐纳德-特朗普总统数个破坏性贸易声明后不断上升的避险需求之间进行了权衡。【原文：Gold steadied near a record high, as traders balanced the latest hot inflation reading in the US against rising haven demand in the wake of several disruptive trade announcements from President Donald Trump.】

item.title: Thoma Bravo 支持的 SailPoint 首次公开募股融资 13.8 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，SailPoint 公司和包括其主要支持者 Thoma Bravo 在内的一批股东为这家企业安全软件公司进行了规模更大的首次公开募股，募集资金 13.8 亿美元，股票定价为市场区间的最高价。【原文：SailPoint Inc. and a group of shareholders including its main backer, Thoma Bravo, raised $1.38 billion in an upsized initial public offering for the enterprise security software company, pricing shares at the top of a marketed range. according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 中国煤炭发电厂的蓬勃发展正在削弱清洁能源的推动力
item.description: 中国去年掀起了十年来最大规模的煤电建设热潮，加强了这种最脏化石燃料在能源结构中的作用，尽管中国的目标是向可再生能源过渡。【原文：China embarked last year on its biggest coal-power building boom in a decade, reinforcing the role of the dirtiest fossil fuel in its energy mix even as it aims to transition to renewables.】

item.title: Invesco 与 Janus Henderson 和 Fair Oaks 展开 CLO ETF 竞争
item.description: Invesco Ltd. 已进入欧洲追踪抵押贷款债务的交易所交易基金领域，目标是在一年内使两只新基金的规模均达到 10 亿美元。【原文：Invesco Ltd. has entered the arena of exchange-traded funds in Europe that track collateralized loan obligations, with a target to hit $1 billion on each of the two new funds within a year.】

item.title: 英国皇家特许测量师学会（RICS）称，一月份市场动荡，英国住房需求冻结
item.description: 英国房产中介称，由于市场崩溃推高了借贷成本，1 月份购房兴趣停滞不前。【原文：UK estate agents said interest in buying houses stagnated in January amid the market rout that pushed up the cost of borrowing.】

item.title: 泽利亚增强为强力气旋，即将抵达澳大利亚
item.description: 气旋 "泽利亚 "在向澳大利亚铁矿石出口中心移动的过程中已增强为强风暴，预计将给沿海地区带来破坏性阵风和强降雨。【原文：Cyclone Zelia has strengthened into a severe storm as it tracks toward Australia’s iron ore export hub, and is expected to bring damaging wind gusts and heavy rainfall to the coastal region.】

item.title: 特朗普为结束乌克兰战争的俄方会谈摇旗呐喊，石油止跌回升
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，他和弗拉基米尔-普京已同意就结束乌克兰战争举行会谈，市场猜测俄罗斯的供应风险可能会有所缓解，石油创下两个多月来的最大跌幅。【原文：Oil held the biggest loss in more than two months on speculation that risks to Russian supply may ease after President Donald Trump said he and Vladimir Putin have agreed to talks on ending the Ukraine war.】

item.title: 墨西哥石油公司将在 10 天内解决令美国炼油商恼火的含水油品问题
item.description: 在美国一些最大的炼油厂抱怨最近装运的原油不适合生产柴油和汽油之后，墨西哥石油公司预计将在未来几天内恢复可用于炼油厂的原油生产。【原文：Petroleos Mexicanos expects to restore production of refinery-ready crude in the coming days after some of the largest US refiners complained that recent shipments weren’t fit to make diesel and gasoline.】

item.title: 纽约西格拉姆大厦通过 12 亿美元债券交易进行再融资
item.description: 房地产投资公司 RFR Holding 的联合创始人阿比-罗森（Aby Rosen）和迈克尔-福克斯（Michael Fuchs）即将敲定一项价值 12 亿美元的商业抵押贷款支持证券，该证券将帮助为曼哈顿中城公园大道 38 层高的西格拉姆大厦（Seagram Building）的债务再融资。【原文：Aby Rosen and Michael Fuchs, co-founders of real estate investment firm RFR Holding, are close to finalizing a $1.2 billion commercial mortgage backed security that would help refinance debt tied to the Seagram Building, a 38-story tower on Park Avenue in Midtown Manhattan.】

item.title: OpenAI 称马斯克竞购初创公司削弱了法律攻击力
item.description: ChatGPT 制造商埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）和首席执行官山姆-阿尔特曼（Sam Altman）的律师在一份法庭文件中表示，埃隆-马斯克全现金收购 OpenAI 的出价驳斥了他在法庭上提出的人工智能初创公司的资产不能为 "私人利益 "而 "转让 "的论点。【原文：Elon Musk’s all-cash bid to buy OpenAI debunks arguments he’s making in court that the artificial intelligence startup’s assets cannot be “transferred away” for “private gain,” lawyers for the maker of ChatGPT and chief executive officer Sam Altman said in a court filing.】

item.title: 美国消费物价指数(CPI)飙升，债券下滑，股市动荡：市场综述
item.description: 在火热的通胀数据刺激美联储押注今年不会有太大降息空间之后，美国政府债券遭到抛售，股市也随之震荡。石油因美俄就乌克兰问题举行会谈的消息而下挫。【原文：US government bonds sold off and equities whipsawed after hot inflation data spurred bets the Federal Reserve won’t have much room to cut rates this year. Oil sank on news of US-Russia talks over Ukraine.】
